headline: Small Stocks May Yet Have Their Day
abstract: After years of underperformance, a lagging sector is even more appealing, its adherents say.
lead_paragraph: Even as large, fast-growth companies, paced by tech favorites like Apple and Amazon, have chalked up huge gains over the last decade, the stocks of smaller companies, known more for their solid but plodding value propositions than their breakneck growth, have lagged.
